name: Namestation
description: Namestation is a platform for managing and tracking your business expenses.

getDocuments.script: fetch('https://w.deepl.com/invoices?request_type=jsonrpc&il=en&method=getInvoices', { headers: { 'content-type': 'application/json' }, referrer: 'https://www.deepl.com/', referrerPolicy: 'strict-origin-when-cross-origin', body: '{"id":68330001,"jsonrpc":"2.0","method":"getInvoices","params":{"limit":100}}', method: 'POST', mode: 'cors', credentials: 'include' }).then(res => res.json()).then(d => d.result.data.map(i => ({ id: i.id, date: i.date, total: i.invoicedAmount.amount/100 + i.invoicedAmount.currencyCode })));
